CORPOREAL.DESCRIPTION: Any card that did not start the turn in your hand, draw pile, or discard pile.

FLOW.DESCRIPTION: When you Flow, you may discard any number of cards. You draw that many at the start of your next turn.

ON_SWAP.DESCRIPTION: Has a special effect when the card is swapped out.

SWAPPABLE.DESCRIPTION: Is tied to another card and can be freely Swapped between the two.

TRANSMUTE.DESCRIPTION: Transforms a card in combat into any card available to your current run.
